post.author: LDAsh
post.body:
Select the entity you want to set and press N. You will see 2 fields called Key and Value. In this you can enter a key angle and a value between 0-359, and that sets the initial direction.

While you're there, notice the info provided from within the editor, each entity class will give you a description about what it does, how it's used and what keys and values you can mess with.
